message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today for $14,000. I believe it represents a great value at this price, considering its unique features and benefits.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $10,000 for it. Would you consider adjusting your price to meet my budget?
Bob, I understand your position, but $14,000 is already a very competitive price. How about we meet in the middle at $13,000? This offer stands as a sign of my willingness to make a deal happen.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand your position, but I am still unable to pay more than $10,000 for the product. Could we possibly meet halfway at $11,000?
